Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Nohomba ulia wachachia ebiloonje , mana alibikalusia, nende ulia ubakabilanga okhurula mwikulu nende khushialo.. koo Nyasaye wundi halala nende Nyasaye? Boola mbu : “rere ebifune bienyu nikali mbu toto muboolanga obulaamba.”
Boola mbu: “abulaho uli mwikulu nende khushialo umanyile akefisile halali Nyasaye, nabo shibamanyile mbu ni liina wabakhalamusibwe tawe
Bubetsele burie obumanyi (bwokhumanya) komwikulu? halali bo bali mubukanakani bwabu, halali bo ni abawofu khubwo
Ne balia bakhaya nibaboola mbu: “olwakhuliba liloba nende bapapa befu mbu khulilamusibwa?”
Toto khwalakwa kano efwe nende bapapa befu bakhale. Kano shinishiosi shiosi tawe halali tsingano tsiakhale
Boola mbu: “ chende khushialo mana mulole shinga indukho yabandu ababii yali.”
Ne olabeelela tawe ne olabamubutinyu tawe khulwa ebifwanga biabu biabakholanga
Ne baboolanga mbu; “ ne indache ino iliula liina? Toto nimuli mbu muboolanga obulaamba.”
Boola mbu: “ nikaboolele ahambi hano ebuleka khumakhuwa kamuyungubalilanga.”
Ne toto Nyasaye wuwo niwetsimbabaasi khubandu halali abaanji mubo shibakhupanga orio tawe
Netoto Nyasaye wuwo amanyile muno akebilifu biabu bifisanga nende akabaretsanga habulafu
Ne libulaho liefisa mwikulu nende khushialo halali lili mushitabu eshiokhwinoosia
Toto Ikurani ino ikananga khu baana ba Isarail amanji kalia akabawukhanangamwo
